summary: REQ-1 cannot be verified from the provided diff excerpt because the `backend/main.mo` content is truncated and the visible portion does not show any wallet/transaction/event type definitions. Additionally, `project_state.json` was modified even though the BuildRequest explicitly constrained this step to be “types only” in `backend/main.mo`.

missing_requirements.requirement: In `backend/main.mo`, add internal Motoko type definitions for organization-scoped wallet domain entities (wallets, wallet transactions, wallet events), Candid-friendly, in the existing canonical style, and including `organizationId : OrganizationId`.
missing_requirements.reason: The visible portion of the truncated `backend/main.mo` diff shows organization/product/CRM/HRMS types but does not show any wallet-related types (wallet/transaction/event), so implementation cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated diff excerpt shows no wallet-related types)

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json` despite the request to limit this step to Motoko type definitions only and to keep all changes in `backend/main.mo`.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints say “types only” and “keep all Motoko logic and type definitions in `backend/main.mo`” with no other wiring/changes; editing `project_state.json` is outside that scope.
